events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return it and get a refund because the product doesn't meet my expectations.
The customer's message indicates a request for refund due to dissatisfaction, so the case is categorized under 'Refund'.
Assigning this refund request to the Refund Specialist team to handle the case appropriately.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund and I'm here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. The product was not as described and I would prefer to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund and provide you with a prepaid return shipping label to send the item back.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions.
We've sent the return label to your email. Once we receive the item, we'll complete your refund within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have already shipped the item back. Thanks for following up!
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow a few business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and feel free to reach out for any future needs.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. We would appreciate your feedback on your support experience.
